document_data.caption: The location of the Old King's Favorite in Suzail.
document_data.name: Old King's Favorite
document_data.mainbody: The '''Old King's Favorite''' was a resplendent and glittering lounge that stood on the grand [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] of the [[Cormyrean]] capital city of [[Suzail]] in 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Location: The club stood on the Promenade, just west of [[Castle Obarskyr]]. The [[Court Close]] hooked around the Old King's Favorite's city block, starting to the west and crossing the Promenade to the east.
document_data.Services: The Old King's Favorite was exuberantly expensive even for the nobility of Suzail. It was renowned for being the most magnificent establishment on the Promenade. The price of the lounge meant statusâ€“the place to be seen at. The Favorite also offered exquisite food and only the best [[wine]]s.
document_data.History: As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Marlin Stormserpent]], a scion of the [[Stormserpent]] family, considered Old King's Favorite one of his favorite places in the city for socializing and finest dining. Lord Stormserpent tried to partake in highsunfeast at the Old King's Favorite on the daily.
